'Curve' is a magazine about industrial design and product design. Published
quarterly since 2002, it features interviews and profiles with designers,
product developers and
manufacturers, [http://www.core77.com/sources/magazines/mags.asp "Design
Magazines"], Core77, accessed 30 August, 2011. as well as coverage of new
materials, technologies and trends in industrial design. [http://curvelive.com/current-
issue "Curve: Current issue"], accessed 30 August, 2011.
